page.title: 18A LOCAL SCHOOL GAME
page.content: BOM BOM. This game can be played by a group of more than three people. The idea of the game is to try to get home before being caught. One person is chosen to be "UP." This person has to wait at a post and count to a chosen number. When the person "up" has finished counting they look for the others. If they spot some one they run back to the post and say "Bom Bom (name of player) 1, 2, 3.". Sometimes a player can manage to get back to the post before the person up reaches home. They say "Bom Bom home 1, 2, 3.". The game finishes when everyone either manages to get home or are caught. If the last person manages to get home they can "save all" and everyone else who have been caught are free and the same person is up again.
